{"id":381519679,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1597547688,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/381519679/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Array Equal","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(int n) {\n        int L = 0; \n        int R = n - 1; \n        int ans = 0; \n        while(L < R) {\n            // cout << 2 * R + 1 << ' ' << 2 * L + 1 << endl; \n            ans += (((2 * R + 1) - (2 * L + 1)))/2; \n            ++L;\n            --R; \n        }\n        return ans; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-array-equal"}
